Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.message

Interface Message

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChatError, ChatMessage, ChooseObjective, ChooseStarter, CreateLobbyMessage, CreateMatchError, DrawError, DrawGold, DrawMarket, DrawResource, ErrorMessage, FailedGameReconnectionMessage, FailedToStartMatchMessage, GameMessage, GameReconnectionMessage, GameStateMessage, GetLobbiesMessage, GetLobbiesResponseMessage, GetLobbyInfoMessage, InvalidMessage, JoinLobbyMessage, JoinMatchError, LeaveLobbyMessage, LeaveMatchError, LobbyInfoMessage, LoginError, LoginMessage, MatchDoesNotExistError, NotifyCardPlayed, NotifyCardState, NotifyChosenObjective, NotifyChosenStarter, NotifyColorsAssignment, NotifyDraw, NotifyEndMatch, NotifyGlobalObjectives, NotifyLastRound, NotifyMatchStarted, NotifyMessage, NotifyPlayerHand, NotifySetUpFinished, NotifyStarterCards, NotifyToChooseObjective, NotifyToChooseStarter, NotifyTurn, ObjectiveChooseError, PlayCard, PlayCardError, PlayerJoinedLobbyMessage, PlayerLeftLobbyMessage, StarterChooseError, SuccessLobby, SuccessMessage, UnauthorizedError
public interface Message extends Serializable
Represents a message in the game. All message types must implement this interface.
